Template.SubjectPart: Pineapple Points 🍍 Purchase Ready for Pickup!
Template.HtmlPart:
Hello {{requestUserFirstName}},

Your Pineapple Points 🍍 purchase of '{{itemName}}' has been marked as Ready for Pickup by {{managerUserFullName}}!

Log in to https://pineapplepoints.net to check the status of your purchase requests.
